channel.title: Changing The Items You Start With When You Creat An Account
channel.description:
When you log into the source I'm using (with a brand new account) you start with 2m cash. How can I change this, I don't want people just creating new accounts and trading the 2m cash to their main. Detailed help would be appreciated, although all\any help is grateful.
Example) Tell me what files, what to search, explain the code a little.
[b]Daniel[/b], [b]xAcid Tripx[/b].
EDIT:
Nvm i just searched 995 in client for a few minutes until i found the starter thing, then i changed the amount of gold to 100k :)

item.title: Changing The Items You Start With When You Creat An Account
item.dc:creator: @xAcid_Tripx xAcid Tripx
item.description:
@xAcid_Tripx wrote:

Old Rsc Player:

maybe you should become more familiar with your source before you try to run a server?

Not really, this is one of the only things i need to know
If someone could tell me…

Read full topic
item.source: Changing The Items You Start With When You Creat An Account
